items.content_html: MiniMusic is a lightweight, responsive web app for playing your favorite tunes. Enjoy a clean interface, intuitive controls, and smooth playback experience on any device. Built with React and @mui/material, MiniMusic prioritizes simplicity and ease of use while offering essential music player features.

Built with React and @mui/material, MiniMusic prioritizes simplicity and ease of use while offering essential music player features.
